channel.title: Supervision on Joel Mackenzie
channel.description: Recent content in Supervision on Joel Mackenzie

item.title: Supervision
item.description: PhD Students Watheq Mansour (primary advisor, current): Efficient and Effective Data Augmentation Strategies for Information Retrieval. Daisuke Yukita (associate advisor, current): Human-centered Verification of Large Language Model Outputs. Farid Ariai (associate advisor, current): Towards Multi-Jurisdictional Legal NLP Systems. Pietro Bernardelle (associate advisor, current): Leveraging Personas to Study and Control Ideological Biases in Large Language Models. Zhixuan Li (associate advisor, current): TBA. Dr Shengyao Zhuang (associate advisor, graduated 2023): Teaching Pre-Trained Language Models to Rank Effectively, Efficiently, and Robustly.
